```{r, include=FALSE}

TRNS_MNTH <-function(date, mm) {

date <- as.Date(paste0(date,'01'), format='%Y%m%d')
date

if (abs(mm) > 1){
  date_fn <- date
  lubridate::month(date_fn) <-lubridate::month(date)-1

  date_st <- date
  lubridate::month(date_st) <-lubridate::month(date)+mm


  date_st <- format(date_st, by='month', length=1, '%Y%m')
  date_fn <- format(date_fn, by='month', length=1, '%Y%m')
  
   if(mm < 0 ){
     return (c(date_st, date_fn))
   } else { 
     return (c(date_fn, date_st))
  }
                 
  } else {
  lubridate::month(date) <-lubridate::month(date)+mm
  date <- format(date, by='month', length=1, '%Y%m')
  return(date)
  }

}


```
